my friend recommended this place before i went to spain, but i was skeptical, since they had asian/fusion tapas.  wtf?  why would i want to eat asian food in barcelona?  well, i ended up stumbling upon it on my last night, and it was a welcome respite from all the jamon i had been eating up to that point.  my friend and i tried the tuna tartare, grilled gambas w/ stir fried noodles, artichokes w/ romesco, and the duck timbale.  washed down w/ 2 glasses of red, and i was good to go.  they were a bit heavy-handed w/ the soy sauce, but i was craving some of that soy after not having any in over a week.
